article_title: CVS Kicks In Another $50 Million For Anti-Tobacco Push

article_metadata.description: CVS Health is escalating its anti-tobacco crusade, allocating $50 million over the next five years to philanthropic endeavors and partnerships with health and advocacy groups beyond its already large corporate commitment. It’s a signal to rival pharmacies that sell tobacco as well as customers and employer clients that CVS wants to [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
